title: Wire the FacetStream into the SQL Interface
description: Currently the SQLHandler uses the RollupStream, which uses a Map/Reduce technique, to build the Group By Aggregations. This ticket wires the FacetStream (SOLR-7903) into the SQLHandler so that users can switch back and forth between the RollupStream (Map/Reduce) and the FacetStream (JSON Facet API) to build the Group By Aggregations.

comments.author: Joel Bernstein
comments.content: Decided to lump this in with SOLR-7903 because the SQLHandlers tests cases strengthen the test cases for the FacetStream.
